content:
I didn't realize it was good practice to post here before creating a tracker so... here's the tracker: https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-32174.

I searched for this issue, didn't find anything, and created a tracker.

But I should have checked here first. :blush:

So is this a known issue and the tracker should be closed or should it remain?
@Mark Iantorno @Grahame Grieve
leave it. I didn't know about it
